thread.title: Kerber beats Stosur in Hong Kong Open semifinals
thread.title_full: Kerber beats Stosur in Hong Kong Open semifinals

title: Kerber beats Stosur in Hong Kong Open semifinals
text: Kerber beats Stosur in Hong Kong Open semifinals Saturday, 17 October 2015 (8 minutes ago) HONG KONG (AP) Angelique Kerber of Germany beat fifth-seeded Samantha Stosur 6-2, 6-2 Saturday in the Hong Kong Open semifinals to move within one win of cementing her place in the WTA Finals in Singapore. Welcome to a scorching Victoria Park where a quickly-filling centre court is preparing for the first of todays semi-final clashes. The introductions are done,... S.China Morning Post 3 hours ago - Sports • Watson beats Chinese Taipei qualifier Ya-Hsuan Lee in three sets • Will face former US Open champion Sam Stosur in quarter-final Britain’s No2... guardian.co.uk 3 days ago - Sports You Might Like Comments Twitter I'm Ib Kerber beats Stosur in straight sets in Hong Kong Open semifinals http://t.co/B0H64WmLFW 2 minutes ago Jessica Gibb-Selleck RT @Tennis : Kerber defeats Stosur at @HKTennisOpen , one win away from qualifying for #WTAFinals .
